summary: Query the list of products and their content quality details by content quality level or content issues
description: Query the list of products and their content quality details by content quality level or content issues.

query.name: category_id
query.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a category.

request_examples.code:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://partner.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/product/get_kit_item_limit?access_token=access_token&category_id=400055&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'GET',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;

schema.name: error
schema.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: message
schema.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: warning
schema.description: Warning message.

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

schema.name: min_limit
schema.description: Item price max limit.

schema.name: max_limit
schema.description: Item price min limit.

schema.name: min_limit
schema.description: Item name length min limit.

schema.name: max_limit
schema.description: Item name length max limit.

schema.name: min_limit
schema.description: Item image count min limit.

schema.name: max_limit
schema.description: Item image count max limit.

schema.name: description_length_min
schema.description: Item description length min limit.

schema.name: description_length_max
schema.description: length max limit for item extended description text part.

schema.name: description_text_length_min
schema.description: length min limit for item extended description text part, when one of the minimum limits for image and text is reached, the item can be added or updated successfully.

schema.name: description_text_length_max
schema.description: length max limit for item extended description text part

schema.name: description_image_num_min
schema.description: length min limit for item extended description image num, when one of the minimum limits for image and text is reached, the item can be added or updated successfully.

schema.name: description_image_num_max
schema.description: length max limit for item extended description image num.

schema.name: description_image_width_min
schema.description: length min limit for item extended description image width.

schema.name: description_image_height_min
schema.description: length min limit for item extended description image hight.

schema.name: description_image_aspect_ratio_min
schema.description: length min limit for item extended description image aspect ( aspect_ratio= image width / image hight ).

schema.name: description_image_aspect_ratio_max
schema.description: length max limit for item extended description image aspect ( aspect_ratio= image width / image hight ).

schema.name: min_limit
schema.description: Item tier variation name length min limit.

schema.name: max_limit
schema.description: Item tier variation name length max limit.

schema.name: min_limit
schema.description: Item tier variation option length min limit.

schema.name: max_limit
schema.description: Item tier variation option length max limit.

schema.name: weight_mandatory
schema.description: Whether weight is mandatory or not for the category.

schema.name: dimension_mandatory
schema.description: Whether dimension is mandatory or not for the category.

schema.name: non_pre_order_days_to_ship
schema.description: Days to ship for non pre-order products.

schema.name: support_pre_order
schema.description: Whether support pre_order for the category.

schema.name: days_to_ship_limit
schema.description: Days to ship for pre-order products.

schema.name: min_limit
schema.description: Min limit of days to ship for pre-order products.

schema.name: max_limit
schema.description: Max limit of days to ship for pre-order products.

schema.name: min_limit
schema.description: Item count min limit that each kit variations support.

schema.name: max_limit
schema.description: Item count max limit that each kit variations support.
